name: Bird Fly High 3D - Sky Trip
description:
Feel like a bird, flying in the blue endless skies with Bird Fly High 3D amazing app. Exciting sky adventure is waiting for you!
Choose one of cute little birds to control;
Admire wonderful nature landscapes;
Fly and explore several locations;
Complete various tasks and missions;
Feel absolute freedom of flight!

How To Play:
Fly over the obstacles.
Catch stars and other objects, as much as possible, for larger airspeed.
Improve your piloting skills and get high score.

Bird Fly High 3D features:
- High-quality realistic sounding;
- Cool bright interface;
- Easy gameplay mode.

Plane games to fly have never been so cool! Get Bird Fly High 3D now and complete challenging fly missions! Enjoy it!
